resources.string: Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.

This android application aims to provide digital portal to all the students of the college. The project as a whole is still in Alpha development stage and requires lot of debugging and suggestions.\n\nYour suggestions are very valuable to us in improving this project as a whole and will be highly appreciated.
We thank GLUG-NITH for providing hosting services at this stage of development of the application.\n(http://glug.nith.ac.in)
